CustomField.description: Checking this box means that when signing a document with DocuSign, the InPerson signing page will display in its own window, as opposed to being embedded inside Salesforce header/sidebar.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set the DocuSign InPerson signing page to display in its own window rather than embedded inside of the Salesforce header and/or sidebar.
CustomField.label: Display InPerson Signing In Own Window
